hibernate-mapping.query: select eligibility from omis.paroleeligibility.domain.ParoleEligibility eligibility where eligibility.offender = :offender and eligibility.hearingEligibilityDate = :hearingEligibilityDate

select eligibility from omis.paroleeligibility.domain.ParoleEligibility eligibility where eligibility.offender = :offender and eligibility.hearingEligibilityDate = :hearingEligibilityDate and eligibility <> :excludedEligibility
select count(paroleEligibility.id) from omis.paroleeligibility.domain.ParoleEligibility paroleEligibility where paroleEligibility.offender = :offender
select eligibility from omis.paroleeligibility.domain.ParoleEligibility eligibility where eligibility.offender = :offender and eligibility.hearingEligibilityDate > :date

select eligibility from omis.hearinganalysis.domain.HearingAnalysis hearingAnalysis inner join hearingAnalysis.eligibility eligibility inner join hearingAnalysis.paroleBoardItinerary paroleBoardItinerary where paroleBoardItinerary = :paroleBoardItinerary order by eligibility.hearingEligibilityDate asc
select eligibility from omis.paroleeligibility.domain.ParoleEligibility eligibility order by eligibility.hearingEligibilityDate asc

select eligibility from omis.hearinganalysis.domain.HearingAnalysis hearingAnalysis inner join hearingAnalysis.eligibility eligibility inner join hearingAnalysis.paroleBoardItinerary paroleBoardItinerary where paroleBoardItinerary = :paroleBoardItinerary or (eligibility.status.category = 'APPEARING') order by eligibility.hearingEligibilityDate asc
